name: ZapBear ⊂(ϟ(ェ)ϟ)⊃
description:
Bear is stuck in a storm. Can you Dodge ϟ with zen-focus and bear-like reflexes?

In this spiritual successor to Flappy Biard arcade game you must jump away from ϟ before you're zapped!

Design & Programming: Quantum Productions
Lightning Sound: http://www.freesfx.co.uk
